channel.title: D-claw Spec Problem
channel.description:
I've been of the RSPS scene for about a year so I'm having a lot of noob problems, I apologize for posting so much, haha. But I've been going at this source for about 30 minutes, and I've been trying to add d claw spec, which is usually extremely easy for me, I added the models etc did it all but I'm getting this error. [code]src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:113: error: cannot find symbol c.clawDamage = 0; ^ symbol: variable clawDamage location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:116: error: package Serv er does not exist Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex];
^ src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:117: error: cannot find symbol if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(o.getComba t().calculateMeleeDefence())) { ^ symbol: method calculateMeleeAttack() location: class MeleeSpecial src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:118: error: cannot find symbol c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc .random(4)); ^ symbol: variable clawDamage location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:118: error: cannot find symbol c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc .random(4)); ^ symbol: method calculateMeleeMaxHit() location: class MeleeSpecial src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:120: error: cannot find symbol c.clawIndex = c.playerIndex; ^ symbol: variable clawIndex location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:121: error: cannot find symbol c.clawType = 1; ^ symbol: variable clawType location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:123: error: cannot find symbol NPC n = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex]; ^ symbol: class NPC location: class MeleeSpecial src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:123: error: package Serv er does not exist NPC n = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex]; ^ src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:124: error: cannot find symbol if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(n.defence) ) { ^ symbol: method calculateMeleeAttack() location: class MeleeSpecial src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:125: error: cannot find symbol c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc .random(2)); ^ symbol: variable clawDamage location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:125: error: cannot find symbol c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc .random(2)); ^ symbol: method calculateMeleeMaxHit() location: class MeleeSpecial src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:127: error: cannot find symbol c.clawIndex = c.npcIndex; ^ symbol: variable clawIndex location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:128: error: cannot find symbol c.clawType = 2; ^ symbol: variable clawType location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\combat\melee\MeleeSpecial.java:134: error: cannot find symbol c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.play erEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); ^ symbol: method getHitDelay(String) location: class MeleeSpecial Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 15 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I'm assuming there are some ints I need to declare but I'm not really familiar with that and I don't know exactly what ints or where exactly to place them, any help/advice is much appreciated!

item.title: D-claw Spec Problem
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

I couldn’t really find a good tutorial that was compatible with my source.

Read full topic

item.title: D-claw Spec Problem
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Looks like you copied a tutorial or snippet.

You are missing methods, variables and your packages are wrong. Might be missing some classes too.

Read full topic

But I’ve been going at this source for about 30 minutes, and I’ve been trying to add d claw spec, which is usually extremely easy for me, I added the models etc did it all but I’m getting this error.
